name: LionFire Open Software
body:
### Welcome to LionFire Open Software
This is the home of open source software made available by LionFire Games.  Not much is published here but hopefully will be some day.

### Projects
* [VOS](https://github.com/jaredthirsk/Vos) - Virtual Object System - a virtual filesystem for objects.
* [Core](https://github.com/jaredthirsk/Core) - Core - common utilities and small frameworks
* More coming soon

### Docs

* [LionFire Open Docs](http://lionfire.readthedocs.io/)

### Contributors
* Jared Thirsk (@jaredthirsk), owner of LionFire Games

Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
